body:
I have a small problem regarding the Solaris binaries. My local computer is MacOSX but I need to install Solaris binaries on a remote computer. Short of compiling the source code, I would like to unpack the *dpkg Solaris package on my local computer to a designated directory.

I would appreciate any help with that.


regards
Steve
